name: Kustom Live Wallpaper
summary: Learn about .KLWP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Kustom Industries KLWP Live Wallpaper Maker is an Android app that allows you to create animated wallpapers, better known as live wallpapers. You can then set those wallpapers as either their home screen or home and lock screen wallpapers. (You cannot set a live wallpaper as just your lock screen wallpaper.)

The wallpapers you create in KLWP Live Wallpaper mkaerare saved as KLWP files. These files contain all the assets, widgets, and effects used to display the wallpaper. You can also download KLWP files online, from Kustom Industries-related forums, and install them using the KLWP app.
